Title: Assassin
Legend: There is no fortress, city or fortifiedwar camp that the feared Shadowblade Assassins cannot infiltrate, and few foes can hope to survive the potent poisons delivered by their wicked daggers.
Intro: An Assassin is armed with Poisoncoated Blades.

Rules.Name: Deathshead Poison
Rules.Fluff: Assassins utilise deadly blends of venom to ensure their mark is slain.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with Poison-coated Blades is 6, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).

Rules.Name: Hidden Murderer
Rules.Fluff: Stalking the shadows, the Assassin only reveals their position when they launch a killing strike.
Rules.Rule: While this unit is within 3"of a friendly CITIES OF SIGMAR AELF unit that has 3 or more models, this unit is not visible to enemy models that are more than 12" away from it.

Rules.Name: In For The Kill
Rules.Fluff: With their target in sight, the Assassin bursts from the shadows and unleashes a flurry of attacks upon the unsuspecting victim.
Rules.Rule: In For the Kill: The strike-first effect applies to this unit if it made a charge move in the same turn.
